comments:
The M4 drop of Eclipse 3.0 won't start using the IBM JDK 1.3.1 under Windows.

Starting from the command line just gets unspecified JVM error - "JVM Terminated
exit code=1".  If I use another JDK to launch eclipse and then launch a debug
instance of the platform using the IBM JDK I get thee following:
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: java.io.FileOutputStream: method
<init>(Ljava/io/File;Z)V not found
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.isAlreadyRunning(Main.java:1502)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:595)
Exception in thread "main"

Java version inof is:
java version "1.3.1"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3.1)
Classic VM (build 1.3.1, J2RE 1.3.1 IBM Windows 32 build cn131-20021107 (JIT ena
bled: jitc))

Yes, Eclipse now requires a 1.4 level VM.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44814 ***
